text: H: Transmitted to Governor.
S: Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 821).
H: Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 888).
H: Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Garcia, Muraoka, Pierick voting no (3) and Representative(s) Cochran excused (1).
S: Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1).  Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Awa, DeCorte).  Excused, 0 (none).
S: 48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-25
S: Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 189).
H: Forty-eight (48) hours notice Wednesday, 04-30-25.
H: Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 189) as amended in (CD 1).

H: The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Marten, Takenouchi, Olds; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Evslin, Pierick.

S: The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Aquino, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Chang.
H: Received notice of change in Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 880).
S: Received notice of change in conferees (Hse. Com. No. 817).
H: House Conferees Changed: Representative Takenouchi added as Co-Chair. Representative Yamashita discharged as Co-Chair.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-25-25 5:00PM in conference room 329.
S: Senate Conferees Changed: Senator Aquino added as Co-Chair. Senator Hashimoto discharged as Co-Chair.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Friday 04-25-25 1:45PM in conference room 329.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-24-25 1:30PM in conference room 329.
H: Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Wednesday 04-23-25 1:30PM in conference room 329.
H: Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Monday, 04-21-25 1:30PM in conference room 329.
H: Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 810).
S: Senate Conferees Appointed: San Buenaventura Chair; Chang, Hashimoto Co-Chairs; Fevella.
S: Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 732).
H: House Conferees Appointed: Marten, Evslin, Yamashita Co-Chairs; Olds, Pierick.
S: Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 621).
H: House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
H: Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No.  573) in amended form (SD 2).
S: Report Adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).  Ayes, 23; Aye(s) with reservations: none.  Noes, 2 (Senator(s) Awa, DeCorte).  Excused, 0 (none).  Transmitted to House.
S: 48 Hrs. Notice 04-04-25.
S: Reported from WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1528) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).

S: The committee(s) on  WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in WAM were as follows: 11 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Moriwaki, Aquino, DeCoite, Elefante, Hashimoto, Inouye, Kanuha, Kidani, Kim, Wakai; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Lee, C., Fevella.
S: The committee(s) on WAM will hold a public decision making on 03-28-25 10:02AM; Conference Room 211 & Videoconference.
S: Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to WAM.
S: Reported from HHS/HOU (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1287) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to WAM.

S: The committee(s) on  HOU recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HOU were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) Chang, Hashimoto, Aquino, Kanuha, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.

S: The committee(s) on  HHS recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS.  The votes in HHS were as follows: 5 Aye(s): Senator(s) San Buenaventura, Aquino, Hashimoto, Keohokalole, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 0 Excused: none.
S: The committee(s) on HHS/HOU has scheduled a public hearing on 03-12-25 1:05PM; Conference Room 225 & Videoconference.
S: Referred to HHS/HOU, WAM.
S: Passed First Reading.
S: Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 102).

H: Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Garcia, Muraoka voting no (2) and Representative(s) Cochran, Pierick, Templo, Ward excused (4).  Transmitted to Senate.
H: Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 962), recommending passage on Third Reading.

H: The committee on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamashita, Takenouchi, Grandinetti, Holt, Hussey, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Kitagawa, Kusch, Lamosao, Lee, M., Miyake, Morikawa, Templo, Alcos, Reyes Oda; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Ward.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Monday, 02-24-25 12:00PM in House conference room 308 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.

H: Report adopted; referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with none voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Garcia, Muraoka, Pierick voting no (3) and Representative(s) Cochran, Matayoshi, Poepoe, Ward excused (4).
H: Reported from HSG (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 765) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

H: The committee on HSG recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Evslin, Miyake, Grandinetti, Kitagawa, La Chica, Pierick; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Kila; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Muraoka; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Cochran.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HSG on Wednesday, 02-12-25 9:00AM in House conference room 430 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on HSG with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Cochran, Ward excused (2).
H: Reported from HSH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to HSG.

H: The committee on HSH recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Marten, Olds, Amato, Chun, Keohokapu-Lee Loy, Takayama, Takenouchi, Garcia; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Alcos.
H: Bill scheduled to be heard by HSH on Tuesday, 01-28-25 9:00AM in House conference room 329 VIA VIDEOCONFERENCE.
H: Referred to HSH, HSG, FIN, referral sheet 2
H: Introduced and Pass First Reading.
H: Pending introduction.
